title: Tridents
content:
mage, though some special Tridents also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Tridents have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Tridents in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Rush Attack, Piercing Strike, and Crippling Strike.
